content: I'm going to re-share the link to the IG Google Doc. @ Bob Milius , you'll write about the HLA-inspired changes yourself? At this point we should probably aim for the best written document that we can produce. We can then migrate that to an "official IG" later. I need to read more about "official IGs".
yes, I'll write up the HLA part.

Hi @ Bob Milius , what timeline do you have in mind? I found out today that the July 24th deadline applies to the IG as well. This means that we must have an official IG into the current build by then. I'm not even sure how time consuming that process is (I've asked Grahame). We should aim to have a finished Google Doc well in advance of that deadline.
I'll work on it asap, but probably won't get to it until later in the week. Which google doc link should I use?

Thanks @ Bob Milius , I have to change a lot of things myself. You can access the latest version below, but feel free to suggest something else (like a Wiki):
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kUmN4yIRhiwOz_sHic4dU2J9_0DKBf6eaVDAOd3dqhY/edit?usp=sharing
